docs.lead_paragraph: "I cried for a week," Ednis Smith said. She had found a marijuana pipe in the wash with her daughter's blue jeans. "I just stayed at home and wept. How could I explain to people that my beautiful 16-year-old daughter had been on pot ever since she was in junior high?" Mrs. Smith is a Mormon, a ...
